title: Dotted Line Face
description:
A muted yellow neutral face with a dotted or dashed outline.

An established comic book trope, dotted lines around a character can represent someone that is invisible or hidden. It can also represent smallness, submissiveness, isolation, and depression.

This emoji has the same expression as üòê Neutral Face.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's dotted line face emoji presents a unique and enigmatic expression, with its features subtly defined by soft, diffused dots and Apple's characteristic smooth gradients. The overall tone is one of quiet contemplation or a sense of fading into the background, achieved through delicate shading and rounded forms. On Apple devices, this emoji evokes feelings of being overwhelmed, speechless, or a gentle disappearance from a conversation, offering a nuanced visual for subtle emotional states.
